body: Ok, so Minecraft changed there website, and my internet and everything is fine. But the login doesn't load for me. Can anyone else not login, or can login?
body_tagged: Ok, so Minecraft changed there website, and my internet and everything is fine. But the login doesn't load for me. Can anyone else not login, or can login?
title: Minecraft.net login help!!

replies.body:
Oh, cool design. I can join, but on my profile skin was reseted.
And I can't find it on my computer. OMG I LOST IT. Fuck
replies.body_tagged:
Oh, cool design. I can join, but on my profile skin was reseted.
And I can't find it on my computer. OMG I LOST IT. Fuck

replies.body: Just wait a day and try again. That's a really known mine craft issue
replies.body_tagged: Just wait a day and try again. That's a really known mine craft issue

replies.body: It's been 3 days, and it still doesn't work :(
replies.body_tagged: It's been 3 days, and it still doesn't work :(

replies.body: Try other browsers, computer (smartphone, tablet), Internet (WiFi somewhere, in cafe or shop).
replies.body_tagged: Try other browsers, computer (smartphone, tablet), Internet (WiFi somewhere, in cafe or shop).

replies.body: Send an email to Mojang at their support website, you don't need to add that special purchase number or anything. Gl :)
replies.body_tagged: Send an email to Mojang at their support website, you don't need to add that special purchase number or anything. Gl :)
